lead_paragraph: Wall Street ended the quarter on a down note as worries about the jobs market overshadowed new confidence about the energy sector.
snippet: Wall Street ended the quarter on a down note as worries about the jobs market overshadowed new confidence about the energy sector.

headline.main: An Up Quarter Ends With a Down Day
headline.seo: Jobs Data Tempers Rise in Energy Shares
headline.print_headline: 1st-Quarter Gains Top 4%, but Final Day Ends Lower
